import React, {useState} from 'react' import styles from './modal-tweet.module.css' import Photo from '../photo' import IconButton from '../icon-button' import {Close} from '../icons' import ThemeButton from '../theme-button' function ModalTweet({onClick= () => {}}) { const [idea,setIdea]=useState('') const layout= [] const onSubmit= () => { localStorage.setItem('TEXT', JSON.stringify(idea)) layout += (localStorage.getItem('TEXT', JSON.stringify(idea))) console.log(layout) onClick(false) } return (
